body:
Yeah, that's not quite enough additional information. First off, did you Try Andy McNeil's tips about the linefeeds yet? Regardless, it would be most helpful if you supplied the actual commands you're entering for the whole workflow, and what "it failed to show up" actually means. It sounds like you may not have X11 set up and that could by why you're not getting anything when you try to run rvu. Details would help here...


- Rob
